definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: He went over and laid down his cup on the tray.
sentences.chinese: 他走过去把茶杯放到茶盘上。

sentences.english: John put his cup and saucer on the coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 约翰把带茶托的茶杯放在咖啡桌上。

sentences.english: Always put your teacup on a saucer, never on the tabletop.
sentences.chinese: 把茶杯托盘上，不要将茶碗直接桌面上。

sentences.english: He chipped a piece off the edge of the cup.
sentences.chinese: 他把茶杯的边打碎了一块。

sentences.english: He poured his visitor's cup full, and then kept on pouring.
sentences.chinese: 茶杯满了，他却还在往茶杯里倒水。

sentences.english: He poured his visitor's cup full, and then kept on pouring.
sentences.chinese: 茶杯满了，他却还在往茶杯里倒水。

sentences.english: The tea cup was filled to the brim.
To the hot water, add about one cup of baking soda for each gallon of water.
sentences.chinese: 在热水中加入量为每加仑水一茶杯的小苏打。

sentences.english: An unfortunate man would be drowned in a tea-cup.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的人会淹死在茶杯里。

sentences.english: This is a cup and saucer.
When I was pouring the tea, I dropped a cup.
sentences.chinese: 我在倒茶的时候，失手打了一个茶杯。

sentences.english: Well, we'll send tea into the room when the visitors come.
sentences.chinese: 下战书我有几位朋侪来访，请给加些热水瓶和茶杯。

sentences.english: Fan Hai Lei picked up noggin to beverage chrysanthemum tea.
sentences.chinese: 范海勒拿起小茶杯喝了口菊花茶。

sentences.english: In addition, the multifunctional combined tea set can prevent tea cups from falling down and can be used as compote.
sentences.chinese: 另外，本茶具还可防止茶杯摔落，并能兼作果盘使用。

sentences.english: I bought a cup and saucer for myself yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我为自己买了一只附有托碟的茶杯。

definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
to drain the cup in one gulp (idiom)
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
